resources.string: Chhatrapati Shahu Institute of Business Education and Research (CSIBER), Kolhapur, Maharashtra was established in 1976. It is a private institute, recognized by UGC and affiliated to Shivaji University. It has been accredited A+ by NAAC. It offers full-time PG courses such as MBA, MCA, M.Sc, MSW, M.Com and a PG Diploma. Additionally, CSIBER also offers M.Phil at the Research level. Admission is either based on merit or an entrance examination.
